name: Popover
description: Anchored overlay surfaces for floating content.

use: you need anchored floating content (menus, previews, tooltips).
you want a popover controller to manage multiple overlays.
avoid: a full-screen sheet or dialog is required.

patterns.title: Managed popovers

theming: Uses theme surface tokens from `Theme.of(context)` for popover styling.
accessibility: Provide a way to dismiss popovers via keyboard and tap outside.
do: Close existing popovers when opening a new one.
dont: Use popovers for long-form content that needs scrolling.
